ygData.msgSnippet: KSL, if FZ s missiles hit Unicron, Unicron would be drained of energy till he gets out of the energy field that the missiles created. ... FZ shot up through

KSL, if FZ's missiles hit Unicron, Unicron would be drained of energy 
till he gets out of the energy field that the missiles created.


::FZ/Killfest/Greven/EndBringer::

FZ shot up through the air, the ES missiles following him. He aimed 
the Vok orb again, firing two bolts that destroyed one of the 
missiles. Laser bolts flew by underneath, the other missiles hitting 
FZ, but the 'clone' kept going.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Vehement raise his arms, Killfest jumps into the air, his 
jetpack activating again and sending him sailing high up. He feels 
the air shaking under him as the sonic wave passes, but it misses 
him. He fires two missiles at Vehement, followed by three more EMP 
blasts.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven boosts out of the way of the two charges, one of the missiles 
hitting him and flipping him backwards, but the Predacon didn't 
really care. The rage of battle was setting into his mind, making him 
ignore most of the damage on his body, which wasn't much at all. He 
aims up at Sun Crusher and fires two missiles from each gun again, 
both of them energy-seeking.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer jumps to the left, both the acid and the normal missiles 
missing him. The seeker hits him, but the large bot barely flinches. 
His two missile launchers fire two missiles each in opposite 
directions, the missiles spreading out and then coming at Reflector 
from four different sides, aimed at his knees. They were heading 
upwards, so Reflector launching himself up wouldn't cause the 
missiles to colide with each other.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/
> The Protectobots/Shockwave:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron turned around, firing a single optic blast, the other 
missile blowing 
> up against his chest.  He laughed, raising a hand, three laser 
bolts lancing 
> out from the palm at FZ's sternum.
> 
> Raising the other arm, he launched off an ES-seeking missile at the 
clone's 
> left knee joint.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement flew hard left firing off a couple optic blasts, 
intercepting the 
> missiles, the two EMP bolts striking his chest, being absorbed by a 
part of 
> his tattered Archbishop robes that were still in good condition.
> 
> Raising both arms together, he fired a large invisible sonic wave 
that shot 
> out at Kilfest's torso, the wave designed to badly damage internal 
circuitry 
> when used on a target enough.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher fired off five optic blasts on an intercept course with 
the 
> inbound missiles, pulling hard left in his flight, making sure he 
stays in 
> the general direction of the northeast towards "Red Hero".  One 
missile 
> blasted him in the chest, knocking him back in the air, extra power 
to both 
> boosters in his feet allowing him to regain his balance in the air, 
blasting 
> forward at an accellerated speed.
> 
> Raising a wrist he launched off two energy-signature seeking 
missiles at 
> Greven.  In his left hand appeared a grenade launcher from 
subspace.  Already 
> set to explode on impact, he fired off two of the small explosives 
downward 
> towards Greven.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector raised a wrist, making quick modifications to a missile 
he launched 
> it, exploding a few feet in front of the other missiles to block 
them.  He 
> fired six rapid blasts in the general direction of the missiles 
just in case.
> 
> He raised his left arm, firing down a spray of acid at Endbringer, 
raising 
> the same twin-barreled mounted launcher attached to his wrist that 
had been 
> fired to intercept the enemy missiles, firing one energy-signature 
seeking 
> missile from one barrel down at Endbringer, two regular missiles 
down at the 
> Predacon immediately after, the Brotherhood member staying on 
course.
> 
> ------
> 
> Hot Spot watched as two CR chambers opened and he yelled.  "Come 
on!  Follow 
> me!  Battle outside, no time to explain!" he yelled, running full 
speed.
> 
> Blades looked to First Aid and gave a confused look.  "Didn't...we 
just fight 
> in a battle?"
> 
> "Yeah, we better hurry though." the medic replied, going after Hot 
Spot with 
> Blades in tow.
> 
> ------
> 
> Demon Wulf felt to blasts strike his right knee and he almost feel, 
but with 
> a free hand he pushed himself back up.  Opening his mouth he fired 
off a long 
> burs to flames at Streetwise.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper formed a black orb in his hand and threw it at the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw launched off two more missiles at the Cybertronian Fire 
from his 
> ports, moving forward a meter.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove slowly got to a knee, taking out a charge and throwing at 
the space in 
> between Flesh Ripper's feet.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise fell to his back as the flames hit him full force 
charring his 
> armor.  He didn't get up.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave made a barrell roll and armed two more missiles.
